com.microsoft.band.notifications

Interface BandNotificationManager


  • public interface BandNotificationManager
    Manager for sending notifications to a Microsoft Band through Microsoft Health's band communication service

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> sendMessage(java.util.UUID tileId, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String body, java.util.Date timestamp, MessageFlags flags)
      Method to send a message to the tile with the given UUID
      BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> showDialog(java.util.UUID tileId, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String body)
      Method to send a dialog to the tile with the given UUID
      BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> vibrate(VibrationType type)
      Method to vibrate the Microsoft Band using the given pre-defined vibration type

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> sendMessage(java.util.UUID tileId,
                                            java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String body,
                                            java.util.Date timestamp,
                                            MessageFlags flags)
                                              throws BandIOException
        Method to send a message to the tile with the given UUID
        Parameters:
        tileId - UUID of the tile to show the message
        title - The title of the message; will be truncated if length exceeds 40 characters
        body - The body of the message; will be truncated if length exceeds 160 characters
        timestamp - Time stamp to show when the message was sent; if null, will be set to the current time.
        flags - MessageFlags.SHOW_DIALOG, message will pop up and then be stored in the tile; MessageFlags.NONE, message won't pop up and will just be stored in the tile; default is MessageFlags.SHOW_DIALOG
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Void return value that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR, BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR, and BandErrorType.TILE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given tileId is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given title and body are both null, empty, or pure whitespace

      • showDialog

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> showDialog(java.util.UUID tileId,
                                           java.lang.String title,
                                           java.lang.String body)
                                             throws BandIOException
        Method to send a dialog to the tile with the given UUID
        Parameters:
        tileId - UUID of the tile to show the dialog
        title - The title of the dialog; will be truncated if length exceeds 20 characters
        body - The body of the dialog; will be truncated if length exceeds 160 characters
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Void return value that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR, BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR, and BandErrorType.TILE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given tileId is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given title and body are both null, empty, or pure whitespace

      • vibrate

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> vibrate(VibrationType type)
                                          throws BandIOException
        Method to vibrate the Microsoft Band using the given pre-defined vibration type
        Parameters:
        type - the given pre-defined vibration type
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Void return value that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR and BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given vibration type is null
